languages.text: "Наивность — какая непозволительная роскошь... Не пора ли взглянуть истине в глаза, Дитя? Нити судьбы не подчинятся тебе только потому что ты этого возжелаешь. Но я могу помочь тебе обуздать их, когда ты будешь готов{mf||а}. К счастью, я великодушен и даю своим избранным Детям время для осмысления. Ибо человеческие души так хрупки..." {n}Резкая боль, и тонкая струйка крови сбегает по виску. {/n}

"Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Наивность — какая непозволительная роскошь... Не пора ли взглянуть истине в глаза, Дитя? Нити судьбы не подчинятся тебе только потому что ты этого возжелаешь. Но я могу помочь тебе обуздать их, когда ты будешь готов{mf||а}. К счастью, я великодушен и даю своим избранным Детям время для осмысления. Ибо человеческие души так хрупки..." {n}Резкая боль, и тонкая струйка крови сбегает по виску. {/n}

Thankfully, I am generous. I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

languages.text: "Naivität ist ein teurer Luxus ... Wird es nicht langsam Zeit, sich der Wahrheit zu stellen, Kind? Die Fäden des Schicksals gehorchen nicht nur Euren Wünschen. Aber ich kann Euch helfen, nach ihnen zu greifen, sobald Ihr dazu bereit seid. Glücklicherweise bin ich großzügig: Ich gebe meinen auserwählten Kindern Zeit, zu verstehen. Immerhin sind die Seelen der Menschheit so zerbrechlich ..." {n}Du spürst einen stechenden Schmerz und ein dünnes Rinnsal aus Blut an deiner Schläfe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

Aber ich kann Euch helfen, nach ihnen zu greifen, sobald Ihr dazu bereit seid. Glücklicherweise bin ich großzügig: Ich gebe meinen auserwählten Kindern Zeit, zu verstehen. Immerhin sind die Seelen der Menschheit so zerbrechlich ..." {n}Du spürst einen stechenden Schmerz und ein dünnes Rinnsal aus Blut an deiner Schläfe.{/n}

languages.text: "Saflık, cesur bir lükstür... Gerçekle yüzleşme zamanı gelmedi mi Çocuğum? Kaderin ipleri arzularına öylece itaat etmez. Hazır olduğunda onları kavramana yardım edebilirim. Neyse ki cömertim. Çocuklarıma anlamaları için zaman tanırım. Ne de olsa insan ruhları çok kırılgan..." {n}Keskin bir acı hissediyorsun, şakağından bir damla kan akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Saflık, cesur bir lükstür... Gerçekle yüzleşme zamanı gelmedi mi Çocuğum? Kaderin ipleri arzularına öylece itaat etmez. Hazır olduğunda onları kavramana yardım edebilirim. Neyse ki cömertim. Çocuklarıma anlamaları için zaman tanırım. Ne de olsa insan ruhları çok kırılgan..." {n}Keskin bir acı hissediyorsun, şakağından bir damla kan akıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « La naïveté est un luxe audacieux... N'est-il pas temps d'affronter la vérité, mon enfant ? Les fils du destin n'obéiront pas à votre simple désir. Mais je peux vous aider à vous en saisir, quand vous serez {mf|prêt|prête}. Heureusement, je suis généreux : j'accorde à mes enfants élus le temps de comprendre. Après tout, les âmes humaines sont si fragiles... » {n}Une douleur vive vous fait tressaillir et un filet de sang se met à couler le long de votre tempe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La naïveté est un luxe audacieux... N'est-il pas temps d'affronter la vérité, mon enfant ? Les fils du destin n'obéiront pas à votre simple désir. Mais je peux vous aider à vous en saisir, quand vous serez {mf|prêt|prête}. Heureusement, je suis généreux : j'accorde à mes enfants élus le temps de comprendre. Après tout, les âmes humaines sont si fragiles... » {n}Une douleur vive vous fait tressaillir et un filet de sang se met à couler le long de votre tempe.{/n}

languages.text: «La ingenuidad es un lujo muy osado... ¿No es hora ya de que afrontes la verdad, criatura mía? Los hilos del destino no se pliegan únicamente a tus deseos. Pero yo puedo ayudarte a manipularlos, cuando estés {mf|listo|lista}. Da gracias por la generosidad con que otorgo a mis criaturas tiempo para comprender. Después de todo, las almas humanas son tan frágiles...». {n}Notas un dolor agudo, y un hilillo de sangre te resbala por la sien.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La ingenuidad es un lujo muy osado... ¿No es hora ya de que afrontes la verdad, criatura mía? Los hilos del destino no se pliegan únicamente a tus deseos. Pero yo puedo ayudarte a manipularlos, cuando estés {mf|listo|lista}. Da gracias por la generosidad con que otorgo a mis criaturas tiempo para comprender. Después de todo, las almas humanas son tan frágiles...». {n}Notas un dolor agudo, y un hilillo de sangre te resbala por la sien.{/n}

languages.text: “无知，何等大胆的奢侈啊……你还没有做好面对真相的准备，是吗，孩子？若是仅凭欲望，恐怕无法驯服命运的丝线。不过，等你准备好了之后，我可以教会你这一切。感谢我吧，我很慷慨，我愿意等待我的神选之子慢慢理解这一切。毕竟，人类的灵魂是如此孱弱……”{n}你感到一阵剧痛，鲜血顺着你的太阳穴流了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “无知，何等大胆的奢侈啊……你还没有做好面对真相的准备，是吗，孩子？若是仅凭欲望，恐怕无法驯服命运的丝线。不过，等你准备好了之后，我可以教会你这一切。感谢我吧，我很慷慨，我愿意等待我的神选之子慢慢理解这一切。毕竟，人类的灵魂是如此孱弱……”{n}你感到一阵剧痛，鲜血顺着你的太阳穴流了下来。{/n}

languages.text: 「純真さとは大胆な贅沢だ…そろそろ真実と向き合う時ではないか、子よ？運命の糸は、お前の望みだけに従うものではない。しかし、準備ができたなら、私はそれを掴む手助けをしよう。幸いにも、私は寛大だ。選ばれし子らに理解する時間を与える。結局のところ、人間の魂はとても脆いからな…」{n}鋭い痛みを感じ、血がこめかみを伝って流れ落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naivety is a bold luxury... Is it not time to face the truth, Child? The threads of fate will not obey your desire alone. But I can help you to grasp them, once you are ready. Thankfully, I am generous: I give my chosen Children time to understand. After all, human souls are so fragile..." {n}You feel a sharp pain, and a trickle of blood runs down your temple.{/n}
